title: Police arrest 14 over viral 'honour killing' video in Pakistan
description: A video showing a couple being shot went viral on social media, sparking outrage and demands for the perpetrators to be brought to justice.
content:
Police in Pakistan have arrested 14 people after a video went viral showing the so-called honour killing of a couple accused of having an affair.
More than a dozen men can be seen surrounding several vehicles in a desert in Balochistan in the footage... [1656 chars]

title: Nine-year-old girl was shot in 'attempted assassination of rival gang members' in Dalston, east London
description: The Old Bailey hears the shooting by a gunman riding a motorbike was part of a rivalry between the Tottenham Turks and the Hackney Turks.
content:
A nine-year-old girl was shot in the head by a motorbike-riding gunman in east London in an attempted assassination of rival gang members, a court has heard.
Ali Nasser, 43, Kenan Aydogdu, 45, and Mustafa Kiziltam, 38 - who are linked to the Hackney ... [2951 chars]
